body.p: The following illustrates the information about major customers required by paragraph 34. Neither the identity of the customer nor the amount of revenues for each operating segment is required.

entry.p: Revenues from one customer of Diversified Company’s software and electronics segments represent approximately CU5,000 of the Company’s total revenues.
